content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-3.5, 2.5)
Consists of steam engine (position(-3.5, 2.5)), pipe group (positions varying, connected to steam engine), offshore pump (position(-9.5, -1.5))

### Crude oil processing at position(22.5, 42.5)
Consists of oil refinery (position(22.5, 42.5)), pumpjack (position(17.5, 40.5)), pipe group (positions varying, connected to oil refinery and pumpjack)

### Sulfur production at positions(27.5, 42.5), (30.5, 42.5), (33.5, 42.5)
Consists of chemical plants at positions (27.5, 42.5), (30.5, 42.5), (33.5, 42.5), pipe groups (positions varying, connected to chemical plants)

## ERROR TIPS
- Ensure that there are no entities blocking the connection points between entities like offshore pumps, boilers, and pipes.
- Verify that the target location for placing entities like boilers is not occupied or unplaceable due to terrain.
- Make sure to remove any existing entities or objects before attempting to place new ones in the same position.
- Check the connection points and fluid flow between entities to avoid errors in fluid transfer.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent in the given logs. Therefore, this section is not included.
